scripts.version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const updateVersion = (file, versionPath, codePath) => { let json = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf-8')); let versionParts = versionPath.split('.'); let codeParts = codePath.split('.'); let version = versionParts.reduce((o, k) => o[k], json); let [major, minor, patch] = version.split('.').map(Number); version = [(major + 1), 0, 0].join('.'); versionParts.reduce((o, k, i, a) => i === a.length - 1 ? o[k] = version : o[k], json); let versionCode = codeParts.reduce((o, k) => o[k], json); versionCode = (parseInt(versionCode, 10) || 0) + 1; codeParts.reduce((o, k, i, a) => i === a.length - 1 ? o[k] = versionCode : o[k], json); fs.writeFileSync(file, JSON.stringify(json, null, 2)); }; updateVersion('./package.json', 'version', 'versionCode'); updateVersion('./app.json', 'expo.version', 'expo.android.versionCode');"
scripts.build:cloud:development:android: npm run version && eas build --profile development --platform android
scripts.build:cloud:development:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile development --platform ios
scripts.build:cloud:development: npm run version && eas build --profile development --platform all
scripts.build:cloud:local:android: npm run version && eas build --profile local --platform android
scripts.build:cloud:local:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile local --platform ios
scripts.build:cloud:local: npm run version && eas build --profile local --platform all
scripts.build:cloud:preview: npm run version && eas build --profile preview --platform all
scripts.build:cloud:preview:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile preview --platform ios
scripts.build:cloud:preview:android: npm run version && eas build --profile preview --platform android
scripts.build:cloud:production: npm run version && eas build --profile production --platform all
scripts.build:cloud:production:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile production --platform ios
scripts.build:cloud:production:android: npm run version && eas build --profile production --platform android
scripts.build:android:windows: npm run version && expo prebuild && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && ./gradlew assembleDebug
